item.title: Loko
item.description: Loko is a premium CB Ambilobe from some of the best lines in the USA. Her sire, Kromatisk from Chromatic Chameleons, is one of my favorite active breeders of the locale. My hope is that we can get some little guys that glow yellow from her and Nugget!

item.title: Lineage: Chromatic Chameleons
item.description: Chromatic Chameleons Felipe Sanchez Felipe Felipe1 Felipe2 Felipe3 Sire Bolt Dam Cowboy’s daughter Kromatisk Kromatisk
